known_issues: Homepage control framework images look poor quality; need replacement with more colourful, text-free images relevant to content
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Create a more colourful, high-quality, text-free image relevant to "Clarify" (inovics-framework-clarify-simple.dim_1200x750.png > inovics-framework-clarify-colourful.dim_1200x750.png)
- Create a more colourful, high-quality, text-free image relevant to "Organize" (inovics-framework-organize-simple.dim_1200x750.png > inovics-framework-organize-colourful.dim_1200x750.png)
- Create a more colourful, high-quality, text-free image relevant to "Normalize" (inovics-framework-normalize-simple.dim_1200x750.png > inovics-framework-normalize-colourful.dim_1200x750.png)
- Create a more colourful, high-quality, text-free image relevant to "Transform" (inovics-framework-transform-simple.dim_1200x750.png > inovics-framework-transform-colourful.dim_1200x750.png)
- Create a more colourful, high-quality, text-free image relevant to "Report" (inovics-framework-report-simple.dim_1200x750.png > inovics-framework-report-colourful.dim_1200x750.png)
- Create a more colourful, high-quality, text-free image relevant to "Optimize" (inovics-framework-optimize-simple.dim_1200x750.png > inovics-framework-optimize-colourful.dim_1200x750.png)
- Create a more colourful, high-quality, text-free image relevant to "Lead" (inovics-framework-lead-simple.dim_1200x750.png > inovics-framework-lead-colourful.dim_1200x750.png)

existing_features.title: Replace the seven homepage CONTROLâ„¢ framework step images used in `frontend/src/components/sections/ControlFrameworkSection.tsx` with higher-quality, more colourful images that contain no text and are visually relevant to each step (Clarify, Organize, Normalize, Transform, Report, Optimize, Lead).

Update the image asset references in `frontend/src/components/sections/ControlFrameworkSection.tsx` to point to the new/replaced image filenames under `/assets/generated/` (keeping the existing layout, aspect ratio, and hover behavior intact).

new_feature_requests.summary: Update homepage control framework images: replace with more colourful, higher-quality images that contain no text and remain relevant to the content

projectName: Replace homepage CONTROL framework images with colourful, text-free visuals
